name: U.S. RAS ASSOCIATION-MIDWEST
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members and staff on green asphalt applications; Encourage a greater use of recycled materials and improved performance for green asphalt application.
Educate Members on green asphalt and support for green asphalt legislation (no bill number).
